title: ‘We Are in a Good Way’: Remco Evenepoel Exits Pyrénées with Tour de France Podium within Reach
content:
Remco Evenepoel appears on course for a podium finish in his first Tour de France, and he’s also got a heightened respect for defending champion Jonas Vingegaard. The 24 year old attracted attention for Belgian straight-talking after last Sunday’s gravel stage in the Tour de France, suggesting Vingegaard perhaps lacked ‘the balls to race’ on … Continued
